---
category: news
title: "Rapid Vocal Recognition in Fur Seal Moms and Pups"
excerpt: "Cape fur seal mothers recognize their pup’s voice 2-4 hours after birth, and pups recognize their mother’s voice 4-6 hours after birth. This is the fastest establishment of mother-offspring vocal recognition for any mammal species (including humans) described to date."
